name: Hamsters & Tomahawks
description:
This is my first entry in my weekly games project. In this game, you play as some sort of Hamster Ash Williams with an endless supply of Tomahawks facing an endless stream of Zombie Hamsters. See how long you can hold them off for!

Read more about this game at: https://glannaweekly.tumblr.com

To anyone interested:
If you have anything you'd like to change about this, be it art or gameplay tweaks, I would love it if you contacted me. I can share the game files with you and will publish any changes made to this game.
